name: Domus Monstra
description:
3 Week Project
  • Unity 2017.2
  • C#
  • English
  • Single Player
  • WEB-GL / PC
Credits
  • Leonardo Tomazi de Souza - Characters / Animations / Design
  • Lucas Schneider Postai - Programming / Management  / Design
  • Vinícius Crestani - Environment / Audio / Design
The Game

Protect  your house (and yourself) from the creatures of the night.

Domus Monstra is highly inspired by Hotline Miami art and gameplay, with the core based on Call of Duty - Black Ops: Zombies. 

You are Barbara, an archer who must defend herself from creatures like Werewolfs, Vampires and Frankenstein's Monsters in a penny dreadful-like house.

Note: Don't forget to use the boxes!

Controls
  • Move Barbara - WASD
  • Shoot - Left mouse button
  • Buy box of arrows - Space
